title: Veterans Day, Impeachment Inquiry & 2020
itunes:title: Veterans Day, Impeachment Inquiry & 2020
description:
Kevin spoke with Dave Brown, Democratic Strategist & former advisor to Sen. Patty Murray, and Emily Miller, Republican strategist and former State Department deputy press Secretary.


They discussed Veterans Day, Republican Congressman Peter King of New York not running for re-election in 2020, comments from Republican Senator Rand Paul on allegations that the President committed a quid pro quo in dealing with Ukraine, the public phase of the House impeachment inquiry, and the 2020 elections.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Kevin spoke with Dave Brown, Democratic Strategist & former advisor to Sen. Patty Murray, and Emily Miller, Republican strategist and former State Department deputy press Secretary.


They discussed Veterans Day, Republican Congressman Peter King of New York not running for re-election in 2020, comments from Republican Senator Rand Paul on allegations that the President committed a quid pro quo in dealing with Ukraine, the public phase of the House impeachment inquiry, and the 2020 elections.
